pages.text: $(br)Using a $(key)Spell Container$() to destroy $(mechanic/hostility#spell_trait)spell-trait$() $(bold)items$() converts them into a school-specific $(key)damage reduction$() value. While wearing a $(key)Spell Container$(), it will automatically consume these $(key)damage reduction$() values to protect you from spell damage.$(br2)The $(key)damage reduction$() value converted from each $(mechanic/hostility#spell_trait)spell-trait$() $(bold)item$() is equivalent to the $(mage/power)Spell Power$() bonus that a corresponding $(bold)max-level$() trait would provide to mobs.
